quests.dayDescription: A day where you met an old friend by surprise.
quests.sampleAnswer: Today I ran into Sarah at the park! It has been years since we last met.

quests.dayDescription: Your first day at a new school.
quests.sampleAnswer: I was so nervous walking through the gates. Everyone seemed to know each other already.

quests.dayDescription: A rainy day spent indoors.
quests.sampleAnswer: The rain pattered against the windows all day. I curled up with hot chocolate and a good book.

quests.dayDescription: A day you tried something new.
quests.sampleAnswer: I tried rock climbing for the first time. My arms were shaking but the view from the top was incredible.

quests.dayDescription: A day you helped someone.
quests.sampleAnswer: I helped an elderly woman carry her groceries today. Her smile made my entire day.

quests.dayDescription: A perfect summer day.
quests.sampleAnswer: We went to the beach, built sandcastles, and watched the sun set over the water.
